EmailTemplate.subject: Real-Time Curtailment Now Available with GoDirect Flight Bag Pro
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Weight and Balance with Real Time Curtailment Now Available with GoDirect Flight Bag ProÂ <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Update your Honeywell Electronic Flight Bag (EFB) Pro application today to achieve the most accurate weight and balance calculations specific to your aircraft cabin and baggage compartment.
- TAILORED: Actual aircraft cabin positions and weights are used to determine the amount of curtailment applied (dashed line) - PROTECTION: Computed weight and balance values are checked against and displayed within curtailed envelope - ACCURACY: APG curtailment protects CG integrity, always ensuring operation is within CG - REGULATORY COMPLIANCE: APG fixed curtailment is FAA and EASA compliant. Complies with regulatory requirement AC 120-27F (5/6/2019) applies to 14 CFR part 91K, 121, 125, and 135 operations
The new feature calculates the effect of each movement individually to determine the amount of "curtailment" needed and then applies this to the original equipment manufacturer (OEM) CG envelope, generating new CG Limits. Simply update to the newest app version to get started.
UPDATE MY APP <[[https://apps.apple.com/us/app/godirect-flight-bag-pro/id1232722107?ls=1]]>
If you are interested in activating real-time curtailment within your aircraft profile, please contact the GoDirect team for additional information about this feature.
